item.title: Just a simple question
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

ok so I am making a chillzone chair when you use money on it, it sits on the chair. But heres the problem. I want the person to go to the chair instead of using money and sitting on the spot you were before you used money on the chair.
so this is my code:

if(UsedOnObjectID == 1099 && ItemID == 995){ deleteItem(995, 1000); setAnimation(1352); sM("You sit down on a Chill Throne for 1K"); return; }

where do i put like (goto object 1099) or something.
Oh and when I sit on a chair, it just stays there even if I do anything. So I also wanna make it like if I do an action and I’m sitting down right now, I get off and do the action
Any help is appreaciated for +1 rep

Read full topic
